attributes.action: UK Nationals who have EU National children living the in the EU
attributes.background: UK Nationals children should not have to use the point based system for the right to move to the UK especially as this will cause disruption to the current education arrangements

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In many circumstances, children of British Citizens and UK residents can apply for a family visa, which is different to the points based system. You can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/uk-family-visa

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the UK Government and Parliament to do.
